meanings.definition: The plural form of the name 'Henry'.
meanings.sent1: The Henrys went for a walk in the park.
meanings.sent2: I met two Henrys at the party last night.
meanings.sent3: The Henrys decided to have a picnic in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: In the land of Henrys, kindness was their currency.
meanings.sent5: The Henrys' laughter filled the room with joy.

meanings.definition: A unit of inductance in the International System of Units (SI).
meanings.sent1: The circuit required several henrys to function properly.
meanings.sent2: The scientist measured the inductance in henrys.
meanings.sent3: When the henrys got together, they formed a powerful magnetic field.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was as strong as a thousand henrys.
meanings.sent5: The henrys in the coil stored energy like a silent battery.
